Text: Take Control of Your Debt TodayPST You are receiving this email because you asked to be sent special offers th rough one of the partners of eValueMarketing eValueMarketing only brings y ou the best offers on the web However if you wish to unsubscribe please follow the instructions at the bottom of the email I Pay Debt ipaydebtc om Take Control Of Your Debt Today Reduce Your Monthly Payments Our r elationships with creditors allow us to negotiate lower interest rates and smaller monthly payments for you Keep Track Of Only One Payment With deb t consolidation you only have to keep track of one payment The stack of bills that piles up everyday will be reduced to one low payment with a lowe r interest rate Stop Creditors From Calling A debt collectors job is to get paid and that means calling you day and night at home or work Put an end to these irritating phone calls today Our agents will deal directly wi th your creditors so you dont have to IMAGE GET STARTED NOWCLICK HERE ipaydebtcom All Rights Reserved If you dont want to get these letters anymore send a blank email logo
